General.Name: Renhe Pharmacy Co Ltd
General.Description: Renhe Pharmacy Co., Ltd. produces and sells pharmaceutical products. It offers Chinese and western medicines and raw materials; and health-related products, including oral solid preparations and liquid preparations, large-volume and small-volume injections, external lotions, liniments, suppositories, ointments, and other dosage forms of drugs and health-related products. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Nanchang, China.
General.Address: No. 998, Honggu Middle Avenue, Nanchang, China, 330038

4.Name: Mr. Feng  Jiang
4.Title: Sec. of the Board & Non-Independent Director
